testcase.name: Karate SOAP API Read Data from External File TestCase 1
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "text/xml; charset=utf-8" ....................... passed And request read("soapInputData.xml") ..................................... passed When soap action "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/CelsiusToFahrenheit" ...... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"] ......................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"][0] ...................................... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"] == ["Microsoft-IIS/7.5"] ................ passed * match responseHeaders["Server"][0] == "Microsoft-IIS/7.5" ............... passed * print responseType ...................................................... passed * match responseType == "xml" ............................................. passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response contains "98.6" .......................................... passed * match response //CelsiusToFahrenheitResult == 98.6 ...................... passed * print responseTime ...................................................... passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed * print responseStatus .................................................... passed

testcase.name: Karate SOAP API TestCase 2
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "text/xml; charset=utf-8" ....................... passed And request read("soapInputData.xml") ..................................... passed When soap action "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/CelsiusToFahrenheit" ...... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"] ......................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"][0] ...................................... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"] == ["Microsoft-IIS/7.5"] ................ passed * match responseHeaders["Server"][0] == "Microsoft-IIS/7.5" ............... passed * print responseType ...................................................... passed * match responseType == "xml" ............................................. passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response contains "98.6" .......................................... passed * match response //CelsiusToFahrenheitResult == 98.6 ...................... passed * print responseTime ...................................................... passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed * print responseStatus .................................................... passed Given url "http://www.dneonline.com/calculator.asmx" ...................... passed And header Content-Type = "text/xml; charset=utf-8" ....................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When soap action "http://tempuri.org/Add" ................................. passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"] ......................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"][0] ...................................... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"] == ["Microsoft-IIS/8.0"] ................ passed * match responseHeaders["Server"][0] == "Microsoft-IIS/8.0" ............... passed * print responseType ...................................................... passed * match responseType == "xml" ............................................. passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response contains "40" ............................................ passed * match response //AddResult == 40 ........................................ passed * print responseTime ...................................................... passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed * print responseStatus .................................................... passed
